name: Spiced Pilaf Beef and Mushrooms
ingredients: Enough – Water, 2x the volume of the rice
2 tsp – Ras El Hanout, mixture: cardamom, cumin, coriander, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg, ginger, paprika….. essentially anything your heart desires… Think Tunisia, Algeria, or Morocco
instructions: Heat some of the oil in a pot, add almonds and raisins; saute for 2 minutes.
Add rice and stir for a short fry
Add water and bring to boil, then reduce heat and summer with lid on for about 15 minutes
Meanwhile, roughly dice onion and slice mushrooms
In another pan, heat the remaining oil and mix in the spice mixture until fragrant
Add onion and fry for 2 minutes
Add ground beef to pan and fry for 2 more minutes.
Add cinnamon and more salt & pepper
Add mushrooms and cook for another 10 minutes on medium heat
Meanwhile, finely chop parsley and juice the lemon
Take Ground beef mixture off heat and add parsley & lemon juice
